subject: Re: Order #SSN4365 confirmed
description_text:
I bought this kit to upgrade my Pro X pedals on December 3, 2025, and today
I decided to open the box to do the upgrade. What you see in the picture is
what I received. I bought the kit for all three pedals, including the
hydraulic rods and the different springs for the clutch and throttle
pedals. I only received what you see in the picture; I'm missing many
things that I paid for in this upgrade kit. So, this kit you sent to me
only cover the brake pedal, all other things are missing.
